title: Characterization of Cl-doped two-dimensional (PEA)2PbBr4 perovskite single crystals for fast neutron and gamma ray detection
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,27196-27203
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04354E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Wei Xie, Sha Gong, Fuyun Hu, Liping Peng
Based on the principle of fast neutron detection, the Cl-doped (PEA)2PbBr4 perovskite can quickly identify the neutrons and γ-photon in the mixed field, and the arrival time of the γ-photon is earlier than the fast neutron.
